techmeme.title: Google's Gemini can now recall and "reference past chats for more tailored help"; the feature is rolling out in English for Advanced subscribers (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Coinbase reports Q4 revenue up 138% YoY to $2.27B, vs. $1.88B est., transaction revenue up 194% to $1.56B, vs. $1.29B est., and trading volume up 185% to $439B (Tanaya Macheel/CNBC)
Roku reports Q4 revenue up 22% YoY to $1.2B, vs. $1.15B est., a net loss of $35.5M, and streaming households up 12% YoY to 89.8M; ROKU jumps 10%+ after hours (Todd Spangler/Variety)
Airbnb Q4: revenue up 12% YoY to $2.48B, Nights and Experiences Booked up 12%, Gross Booking Value up 13% to $17.6B vs. $17.2B est.; ABNB jumps 13%+ after hours (J. Edward Moreno/Sherwood News)
In 2024, crypto scams received at least $9.9B on-chain, up 40% YoY and likely a record; scams marketplace Huione Guarantee received $376M+ in crypto in 2024 (Chainalysis)
